channel.title: New Torva Full Helm [PI] Wont Wear Correct
channel.description:
ok so this is whats wrong torva helm wont wear I added the helm under item.java and helm still don't look right heres a pic I also added it inder itemassistant.java as player hat I still get the same results even when I trye to change the ints....
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/15x6592.jpg[/img]

item.title: New Torva Full Helm [PI] Wont Wear Correct
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Alternatively, you could put:

if(itemId == 17800)
     return true;

Into the isFullHelm method. tbh I don’t see why anything is in the isFullMask. You should only need it in isFullHelm.
And yes, exactly as I put that code is how you’d put it.

Read full topic
item.source: New Torva Full Helm [PI] Wont Wear Correct

I got rid of the fish thing but helm still wont wear right and ive tried removing those from isfullmask and is full helm

item.title: New Torva Full Helm [PI] Wont Wear Correct
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

remove “&& itemId != 17800” from both the isFullMask method and the isFullHelm method.

Read full topic

item.title: New Torva Full Helm [PI] Wont Wear Correct
item.dc:creator: @boi_jx boi_jx
item.description:
@boi_jx wrote:

 this is the ints from the client
case 17800:
	itemDef.modelid = 67442;
	itemDef.name = "Torva full helm";
	itemDef.description = "Torva full helm.";
	itemDef.modelZoom = 672;
	itemDef.modelRotationY = 85;
	itemDef.modelRotationX = 1867;
	itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
	itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3;
	itemDef.anInt165 = 66475;
	itemDef.anInt200 = 66475;
	itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
	itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
	itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
	itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
	itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop";
	break;
case 17802:
	itemDef.modelid = 67440;
	itemDef.name = "Torva platebody";
	itemDef.description = "Torva Platebody.";
	itemDef.modelZoom = 1513;
	itemDef.modelRotationY = 566;
	itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
	itemDef.modelOffset1 = 1;
	itemDef.modelOffset2 = -8;
	itemDef.anInt165 = 66680;
	itemDef.anInt200 = 67072;
	itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
	itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
	itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
	itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
	itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop";
	break;
case 17804:
	itemDef.modelid = 67437;
	itemDef.name = "Torva platelegs";
	itemDef.description = "Torva platelegs.";
	itemDef.modelZoom = 1550;
	itemDef.modelRotationY = 344;
	itemDef.modelRotationX = 186;
	itemDef.modelOffset1 = 5;
	itemDef.modelOffset2 = 11;
	itemDef.anInt165 = 66593;
	itemDef.anInt200 = 66983;
	itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
	itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
	itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
	itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
	itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop";
break;

this is what I got under
itemassistant.java

if (item == 17800) {
return “hat”;
}

and this is what I got for item.java
ive added it to the helm and stuff in this folder too just showing u an example on where I added it

private static String[] fullhat = {
	"med helm", "coif", "Dharok's helm", "Slayer helmet", "hood", "Initiate helm",
	"Coif","Helm of neitiznot","Armadyl helmet","Berserker helm", 
	"Archer helm", "Farseer helm", "Warrior helm", "Void", "Lumberjack hat", "Reindeer hat",
	"Larupia hat", "mask", "Kyatt hat", "Bomber cap", "Dwarven helmet", "Hooded cloak", "Saradomin team hood", "Zamorak team hood", "Ringmaster hat", "DC Hat", "Halo Helmet", "Torva Full Helm"
};
private static String[] fullmask = {
	"full helm", "Afro", "afro", "mask", "Verac's helm", "Guthan's helm", "Karil's coif", "mask", "Torag's helm", "sallet", "Saradomin helm", "Lunar helm", "Halo Helmet", "Torva Full Helm"
};
public static boolean isFullHelm(int itemId) {
	String weapon = getItemName(itemId);
		if (weapon == null)
			return false;
	for (int i = 0; i < fullhat.length; i++) {
		if (weapon.endsWith(fullhat[i]) && itemId != 2631 && itemId != 11277 && itemId != 11278 && itemId != 17800) {
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
}	public static boolean isFullMask(int itemId) {
	String weapon = getItemName(itemId);
		if (weapon == null)
			return false;
	for (int i = 0; i < fullmask.length; i++) {
		if (weapon.endsWith(fullmask[i]) && itemId != 2631 && itemId != 9925 && itemId != 10728 && itemId != 11277 && itemId != 11278 && itemId != 17800) {
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
}
